comments: Contribution from _Johannes W. Meijer_, Jun 27 2009: The o.g.f. of this sequence enabled the analysis of A162008, A162009 and A162010.
references: A. Fransen, Conjectures on the Taylor series expansion coefficients of the Jacobian elliptic function sn(n,k), Math. Comp., 37 (1981), 475-497.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
G. Viennot, Une interpretation combinatoire des coefficients des developpements en serie entiere des fonctions elliptiques de Jacobi, J. Combin. Theory, A 29 (1980), 121-133.
links: Simon Plouffe, Approximations de séries génératrices et quelques conjectures, Dissertation, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
Simon Plouffe, 1031 Generating Functions and Conjectures, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
maple: A004004:=-z*(1+3*z)/(9*z-1)/(z-1)**2; [Conjectured by _Simon Plouffe_ in his 1992 dissertation.]
crossrefs: Equals the second right hand column of triangle A162005 divided by 2.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Simon Plouffe_
